== TrickyWiki ==

=== TrickyWiki ===

TrickyWiki is a small Wiki engine I develop for a Polish LoCo team. It's PHP/MySQL based. It's not ready yet, but if you'd like to help me with it, just use my Wiki page and ask for an account for a Subversion repo.
